Title: Mutiny on the Windbreaker
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Kit Boss, Jim Dauterive (creator), Lizzie Molyneux (story editor), Kelvin Yu (story editor), Scott Jacobson (executive story editor), Holly Schlesinger (executive story editor), Wendy Molyneux (story editor), Nora Smith (story editor), Steven Davis (story editor)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, John Roberts
Plot: Bob brings the family along when he is hired to be a chef on a docked cruise ship, so they can see his skills outside the restaurant.
